update bus_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, register_ip = #{registerIp,jdbcType=CHAR}, recent_ip = #{recentIp,jdbcType=CHAR}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, fans_currency = #{fansCurrency,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, flow = #{flow,jdbcType=REAL}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, years = #{years,jdbcType=INTEGER}, statTime = #{stattime,jdbcType=DATE}, industryid = #{industryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sms_count = #{smsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, istechnique = #{istechnique,jdbcType=INTEGER}, advert = #{advert,jdbcType=INTEGER}, busmoney_level = #{busmoneyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regionids = #{regionids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isagent = #{isagent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agentid = #{agentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_source = #{loginSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_binding = #{isBinding,jdbcType=BIT}, unbundling_time = #{unbundlingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fixed_phone = #{fixedPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM bus_user WHERE name=#{login_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from bus_user where name=#{login_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT id FROM t_wx_public_users WHERE bus_user_id = #{userId}

SELECT m.item_key as levelid,m.item_value as levelname from ( SELECT distinct levelstyle FROM t_man_common_menus WHERE loginstyle=#{loginuc} AND modelstyle=#{modelstyle} AND (id IN (SELECT menus_id FROM t_man_common_menus_level WHERE level=#{level} and (industryid= 0 or industryid=#{industryid})) OR id IN (SELECT DISTINCT(menus_id) FROM t_man_common_menus_role WHERE role_id IN (SELECT role_id FROM t_man_common_user_role WHERE bus_user_id=#{userId}))
)) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_key,item_value FROM t_man_dict_items WHERE dict_id=(SELECT id FROM t_man_dict WHERE dict_type='1193'))m ON a.levelstyle=m.item_key
select a.id ,a.`name`,a.phone, 1 as type from bus_user a ,t_wx_public_users b ,t_wx_shop c where a.id = b.bus_user_id and b.id = c.public_id and c.id= #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT a.* from bus_user a ,t_wx_shop b WHERE b.bus_id = a.id and b.id =#{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
